Name: Issue 343
Summary: MAUI Preview 14. Get ready for that GA!
Introduction: G'day everyone, welcome to issue #343 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrapup of the Xamarin and MAUI communities this week. This week we have the release of MAUI Preview 14 as well as new Visual Studio Mac previews. Have a great weekend everyone. ♥️ Kym

Articles.Title: Announcing .NET MAUI Preview 14
Articles.Description: .NET MAUI Preview 14 has shipped with plenty of great new features to try out including a hefty volume of issue resolutions and features, including the MenuBar!
Articles.Author: David Ortinau

Articles.Title: How you should be using (and naming) resources in XAML
Articles.Description: Naming things is hard. This is true of code, but also XAML resources. Here are a couple of tips and best practices.
Articles.Author: Matt Lacey

Articles.Title: Setting up CI for your .NET MAUI iOS app with GitHub Actions
Articles.Description: This post shows how to set up CI for your .NET MAUI iOS app using GitHub Actions.
Articles.Author: Andreas Nesheim

Articles.Title: Using SVGs as an iOS image asset in Xamarin
Articles.Description: This article covers a no-dependency way to use an SVG image as an iOS image asset in Xamarin mobile application.
Articles.Author: Aleksei Starkov

Articles.Title: Signup Form Design in Xamarin Forms
Articles.Description: Building a signup UI in Xamarin Forms.
Articles.Author: Leomaris Reyes

Articles.Title: Replicating a Fashion UI in Xamarin.Forms
Articles.Description: This post replicates a fashion app UI based on this Dribbble design.
Articles.Author: Leomaris Reyes

Articles.Title: Blazor for .NET MAUI: What, How and When
Articles.Description: .NET MAUI promises to make native development much easier, especially if you already know how to build for the web.
Articles.Author: Jon Hilton

Articles.Title: Playing With New .NET MAUI Views: Border, Shadow & GraphicsView
Articles.Description: Shadow, Border & GraphicsView - Want to see what these .NET MAUI Views have in terms of functionality? Check out this post.
Articles.Author: Damien Doumer

Articles.Title: Sands of MAUI: Issue #48
Articles.Description: The week in MAUI with Sam.
Articles.Author: Sam Basu

Articles.Title: Hello, .NET MAUI Preview 14 with Essential Interfaces and Desktop MenuBars!
Articles.Description: That is right, .NET MAUI Preview 14 is here and is so close to Release Candidate state! Preview 14 of .NET Multi-platform App UI (MAUI) is now available in Visual Studio 2022 17.2 Preview 2 and includes a hefty volume of issue resolutions and completed features, and one new feature that will be a welcome addition for desktop developers: the MenuBar.
Articles.Author: James Montemagno

Articles.Title: Easily Show Platform-Specific Dialogs with .NET MAUI Blazor
Articles.Description: Need to show prompts or dialogs from your Blazor application? With .NET MAUI it almost couldn't be easier! Write a little wrapper leveraging dependency injection and you can access all the power of .NET MAUI and the underlaying platforms straight from your Blazor application.
Articles.Author: Gerald Versluis

Articles.Title: .NET MAUI Preview 14: Essentials Interfaces and MenuBarItems Party!
Articles.Description: Time for another release party! .NET MAUI Preview 14 has landed! Whoop! In this video Gerald updates you on all the things.
Articles.Author: Gerald Versluis

Articles.Title: Merge Conflict: 297: The Ultra Apple Event Recap
Articles.Description: We have a full breakdown of the latest Apple event with M1 Ultra, new Mac Studio, iPhone SE 3rd gen, and a new iPad!
Articles.Author: Merge Conflict

Articles.Title: Visual Studio 2022 for Mac Preview 7
Articles.Description: Visual Studio 2022 for Mac 17.0 Preview 7 is here and continues the focus on addressing top issues and driving forward to a high-quality GA (general availability) release. In addition to many fixes, this release brings back Xamarin mobile tooling as a supported experience and introduces Azure Functions V4 tooling which supports running on .NET 6 & M1 processors.
Articles.Author: Jordan Matthiesen

Articles.Title: MFractor Now Available For Visual Studio Windows 2022
Articles.Description: MFractor is now available for Visual Studio Windows 2022!
Articles.Author: Matthew Robbins
